flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: The case is completely designed using Blender, an open source 3D application. I wanted a case that would allow me to take my Arduino to work and pick up where I left off without the teardown.
guide.introduction_rendered:
The case is completely designed using Blender, an open source 3D application. I wanted a case that would allow me to take my Arduino to work and pick up where I left off without the teardown.

Relevant parts
  • 3mm PLA Plastic
  • ABS Plastic
Tools
  • 3D printer

lines.text: Go to Thingiverse to get the STL files.
lines.text_raw: Go to [http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:36897|Thingiverse] to get the STL files.

lines.text: Print Away! it is all free!
lines.text_raw: Print Away! it is all free!

guide.summary: A travel case for your Arduino projects.
guide.title: Arduino Book Case
